@description.name: @description
@description.body: This modules eases the communication with a RESTful web service by providing a client-side wrapper of a REST resource. See {@link qx.bom.rest.Resource}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: description {Map?} Each key of the map is interpreted as action name. The value associated to the key must be a map with the properties method and url. check is optional. Also see {@link qx.bom.rest.Resource#map}.
@param.description: Each key of the map is interpreted as action name. The value associated to the key must be a map with the properties method and url. check is optional. Also see {@link qx.bom.rest.Resource#map}.
